__e: He said he had to see her about some problem With the books and I... I believed him.
My uncle used to own an accounting firm and my mom made me work for him... a lot.
Was a guy in accounting... And he was working late and I was working late... And had no one in the building.
Now, I want you to go into that school's payroll office and...
Where will I write, read and do the family's accounting?
When a man finds himself at the end of his days... He has to take an account of his life.
